entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
